Zappar | App Developer | London | https://www.zappar.com

Zappar is an award-winning mobile Augmented Reality app powering experiences for some of the world's biggest brands. We're an intentionally small team who take great pride in our work from the first line of code to the last pixel of our epic content, and we're thrilled to have delivered tens of millions of Zappar experiences to users around the globe.

Zappar’s apps are at the core of our offering. They’re the portal to the amazing Augmented Reality content that has delighted the millions of users who have downloaded and used our apps so far. With a great user base comes a great responsibility to innovate and improve whilst maintaining ease of use and reliability. That’s why we’re looking for talented cross-platform app developers ready to take on a new set of challenges. In addition to our own apps we also help our customers to embed Zappar technology in their apps – a process with its own set of challenges and rewards.

Must have:

  • Solid knowledge and experience of multiple mobile platforms, preferably iOS and Android
  • Android candidates must have excellent Java skills
  • iOS candidates must be proficient in Objective-C
Nice to have experience of (if not, you'll be learning it quickly):

  • Android NDK
  • JavaScript
  • C++
